channel.title: A^x object help!
channel.description:
Hi, I have two questions. I found the math/exp module, which returns y=pow(2,(x/8)-2) Why x/8?
I am in need of a module that returns y=(pow(A,x) where A is a k-rate signal between 20 and 2000 and x (the exponent) is between 0 and 1. Is that possible? Does anybody know how to do this? Thanks

item.title: A^x object help!
item.dc:creator: @gabriel
item.description:
@gabriel wrote:

Hi,
I have two questions.
I found the math/exp module, which returns y=pow(2,(x/8)-2)
Why x/8?

I am in need of a module that returns y=(pow(A,x) where A is a k-rate signal between 20 and 2000 and x (the exponent) is between 0 and 1. Is that possible?
Does anybody know how to do this?
Thanks
